muteme.success: You have been muted for {duration}. Take care of yourself!
muteme.invalid_duration: (Note: Invalid duration format "{duration}". Defaulted to 30 minutes)
muteme.duration_capped: (Note: Duration capped at maximum of 1 day)
language.set.error.not_admin: Only administrators can change the language
error.generic: An error occurred. Please try again later.
error.api_failed: Failed to communicate with Telegram API. Please try again later.
